A Simple Timer for Those Who Struggle with Focus

This extension provides a straightforward timer designed to help individuals stay focused on their tasks. It is preset to a 25-minute focus period, ideal for breaking work into manageable intervals and encouraging deep concentration. With easy-to-use controls for starting, pausing, and resetting, itâ€™s perfect for boosting productivity and maintaining focus.
